allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate Select tool to ToolContext, delete legacy code

Phase 8:
- Rewrite Select tool to use Editor + ToolContext + FontEngine
- Remove editSession\(\) compatibility layer from Editor
- Delete EditSession interface and EditEngine class

Phase 10a:
- Delete RustBridge.ts \(replaced by FontEngine managers\)
- Delete commands.ts \(command pattern no longer used\)
- Delete old FontEngine.ts in lib/core/
- Delete PatternMatcher, PatternParser, RuleTable, EditActions
- Move snapshotToContours to render.ts

Fixes:
- Add font:loaded to EventName type
- Fix Glyph -> GlyphSnapshot in store.ts
- Fix missing return values in Contour/ContourManager
- Exclude test files from typecheck

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
